price: 我将退避你们，以及你们舍安拉而祈祷的。我将祈祷我的养主，我或许不为祈祷我的养主而变为薄命的人。”
arabic: وَأَعۡتَزِلُكُمۡ وَمَا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّي شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wa-aʿtazilukum wamā tadʿūna min dūni al-lahi wa-adʿū rabbī ʿasā allā akūna biduʿāi rabbī shaqiyyan
